name: Brunexplorer
description:
Brunexplorer allows you to explore different location in Brunei virtually. In the web version, these locations are available:

  • Eco Corridor (credits to ASEAN Skyline)
  • Pekan Bangar (credits to Wikimedia)
  • Taman SOAS (credits to Tripify)
  • The Frame (credits to Tripadvisor)

Music is Glockenspiel version of 'Dang Mengalai', classic Bruneian song.

CONTROLS

Directional button - Move

Esc key - Open Menu
